Tests exception message contains stack with correct function name.

function-name-in-con…message-stack.js:14 Uncaught Error
foo.displayName @ function-name-in-con…message-stack.js:14
bar.displayName @ function-name-in-con…message-stack.js:20
baz.function.name @ function-name-in-con…message-stack.js:25
setTimeout (async)
(anonymous) @ function-name-in-con…message-stack.js:32
